Description: 
This application implements three commands to demonstrate the operations related to the text, such as the creation of the text, the mtext and the textstyle.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "Samples.sln" and switch to the configuration that matches with the ZWCAD versionï¼Œthen build the application.

To use MakeText.zrx:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing.
2. Run APPLOAD command and load the MakeText.zrx file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "TextSample" command, which draws a text "TextSapmle". 
4. Execute the "MTextSample" command, which draws a mtext "MTextSample". 
5. Execute the "TextStyleSample" command, which creates the textstyle called "new TextStyle". To see the effect, and you can change the style of the text or mtext to the one you create.
